description: Local ingredients such as Sauris trout, Malga cheese, eggs and herbs feature on the menu at this charming restaurant with spectacular views of the surrounding peaks. In a modern dining room where the colours black and gold dominate, Andrea serves delicious creative recipes such as his signature dish of pigeon cooked two different ways with a sweet and sour bitter cherry, peanut and shallot sauce.
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Car park, Great view, Terrace, Wheelchair access
